title: Realistic Material and Lighting Setup for Robots
description: This section provides comprehensive guidance on creating realistic materials and lighting setups for robot visualization in Unity. Proper material and lighting configuration is essential for high-fidelity digital twin rendering that accurately represents real-world robot appearance and behavior.
